page.title: 16Maldwyn Sports Centre
page.content: We are lucky to have the Maldwyn Sports Centre in our area.There you can{swim,play squash,badminton,table {tennis, basket ball,indoor football and lots of other sports.Also you can use the multi-gym and keep fit to music. Our school uses the centre for swimming and badminton.I do badminton twice a week,on Wednesday evening and Friday lunchimes. When we interviewed the manager we asked him why so many people use the {centre.He said he thought it was {because lots of people now think that {exercise is important.On the way in there is a machine that measures your heart-beat.In the mornings unemployed people use the centre and during the school holidays there is a playscool there.
